tree.caption: The video showcases the determination and dedication of boxers as they prepare for upcoming fights. The boxers are shown to be intensely focused and serious, with various expressions and body language conveying their commitment to their craft. The video also highlights the emotional toll of previous fights on the boxers, with one expressing frustration and a desire to move on, while another contemplates a potential rematch. The video cuts between these moments, showcasing the introspective and focused nature of the boxers and trainers as they prepare
tree.summary: A boxer, visibly battered from his recent fight, reflects on his training and preparation, sharing his thoughts on the emotional toll it took on him and his desire to move on from the experience. The video cuts between shots of the boxer's face and the ring, setting an intense atmosphere with heavy metal music and commentary.
